attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have all heard of or experienced the "neighbour from hell", who know their rights & abuse all, with no recourse from Council's or Police, who continualy say that there is nothing they can do. If they are evicted from an area they are then moved into another area to abuse the next unsuspecting neighbours. This must stop, we all should have rights, not a system thats geared up for the wrong doer's of this world. three strikes & your out, children or not....
